website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, well-made travel bowl for most size dogs.
pros: Pet owners were pleased with the excellent quality and great design that is heavy duty, but lightweight
It also stands out for holding water well without leaks and drying quickly after use
cons: On the deep side, so it may not be ideal for smaller dogs

customer_reviews.title: Good value, not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design with the inverted top so I can fill part way and leave in the back seat for the dog while driving. I have a waterproof back seat liner but this design minimized spillage while on the road. Even when used on level, still, surfaces I did note that if you get within an inch of the top that I see leakage. Mineral stains from the then dried water leave markings on the outside of the bowls. Not as good as a bowl then neighbors gifted me which had a more rubberized interior/exterior.
customer_reviews.author: C_Kritter

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good materials, and roomy. All components were larger than expected, and that's not a bad thing. The bag holds plenty of food for a long weekend and the bowls hold plenty of food and water. If I were changing anything I'd add some snaps or ties to keep the bowls compressed and together for transport or storage and maybe even a way to keep them attached to the bag. Even without that I still consider it a very worthwhile set.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. I purchased this for a mountain trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I purchased this for a mountain trip with my full sized German Shepard. Love that it was stable, compact and held lots of water. Also does not slide around when used. Quality looks well made as well. Originally I though it might be a bit too big, but I after using it, realized it was perfect!!! Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. My husband and I travel with the dogs a lot no matter what season. When the dogs get hungry during camping trips or ice fishing trips the bowls are so easy to pop open and pour the dog food/water in. They are deep enough to where things do not spill as well. The larger tote that carries the dog food is great and so easy to pack up in a camping bag and keeps everything dry. I am very happy with this purchase and it’s convenience. It was a Christmas gift to my husband and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl, note these are pretty deep if your dog is smaller
customer_reviews.text: Great bowl, great construction. A heads up on the size- for a small dog (mine is 50 pounds) the bowls are very deep. I actually fold the lip down to make them more shallow so she can drink water out of them easier. If I leave them without folding the lip down, she seems to have a little trouble drinking because they are so deep and her snout is not that long! But overall these are great! Very solid construction which I love, once you pick them up they immediately scream "High Quality"
customer_reviews.author: Gabby D.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sized for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are really well made and seem like they'll hold up for a long time. We have 2 large dogs and we're looking for compact bowls to take hiking and on road trips. I almost bought some of the silicone collapsible bowls but they were all too small for us. The food bag is also a nice plus. It will hold a surprising amount of food, and since it rolls up we can bring only the food needed for a trip rather than a 30lb bag full of food
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: These bowls seemed to be well built and rugged. They stand up on their own and have held up to the abuse from my German Shepard so far
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. The large bag holds lots of food & the individual bowls are a good size. The water bowl stays waterproof far longer than I expected it to, which was a nice surprise. We were able to leave it overnight for our dog with no issues. I would absolutely recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: J. Klun

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money! Leaky bowls and most likely fraudulent reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today and decided to test how waterproof they were. The bowl can’t even hold water for 2-3 hours. The first 1-2 hours everything seemed fine but water has begun to seep through the fabric around the 3 hour mark. Also, has others have stated the bowls are ginormous and look like they were made for a Great Dane. I bought these bowls for biking and camping but they’ll probably just end up in my trash because this item is garbage. I’m starting to think they only have 5 star reviews from doing the scam where they buy their own product and review it. I don’t see how anyone would like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler R. Brundage

customer_reviews.title: Less than impressed
customer_reviews.text: The bowls and bag are good sized, but I would not buy them again. Hard to clean or keep cleaned. The bag allows the oils in the food to eventually seep through and stain or otherwise transfer odor to whatever it is sitting on or against. The water bowl will also allow moisture to penetrate and wet/soak the surface below it. Being made of material that is not easy to clean, allows bacteria growth to set in.
customer_reviews.author: S Lacher

customer_reviews.title: Good idea.  Works well with some improvisation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concept. Superior to the old plastic bucket we carried for thousands of miles because the more you use it the smaller it becomes. Very nice when heading into a hotel room at night with suitcases and stuff because this textile system makes it easy to carry the dog’s food, water dish, etc. The rigidity of the bowls is perfect. Size is ok too. But, the bowls are not waterproof and for many reasons, that’s not good. I figure I’ll use either a hotel room’s thin plastic liners or a poop bag folded over and line the nylon bowl with those (think an ice bucket liner in a motel room).
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: Inner and outer fabrics are bound together only at the top using non waterproof fabric. Result is the outer shell ends up damp or just plain wet. Just not a very good water dish. Wouldn't buy it again. FOLLOW UP: Seller was very interested in my feedback and seems very willing to try to make a better product/experience. Didn't love the product but I would do business with this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Clark

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for travel
customer_reviews.text: Just got to use these at the ren fair with my pups. I have a black... lab? Lab ish dog (70+ pounds) and a rat-ish terrier (20-25 pounds) I DO wish I had gotten something a little bigger, however it allows me to empty her water out and roll with easy. I had to put it through the laundry twice, and it still looks a little dirty, but overall I know it’s clean. Would recommend, just wish it got that clean look again. Do not recommend for anything bigger then a lab, or a dog with a flatter face.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.Pain

customer_reviews.title: After a year of use I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Update March 25 2020. Almost made it a year. Good enough product so long as you are prepared to purchase yearly. Took it out from the bin in my garage for use now that it's getting nice out and will not hold water. I can't find holes but all the water drainsafter 5 minutes. Unfortunately I won't be purchasing again. I'll be looking for a more quality product. I don't mind paying more for something that lasts. Original post: Exactly what I expected. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Phonon Sully

customer_reviews.title: Good product. As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. We used these when we went camping. It is cloth but it stands up pretty well for a water bowl. The big pouch doesn't hold enough food for our girls for more than a day (MAYBE two if we really stretch it). We have a rottweiler and german shepherd. Make sure you keep it up though because it's not sealed and can get ants in it.
customer_reviews.author: Walker.09

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with the quality of the collapsible dog bowl
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the quality of the collapsible dog bowl. These bowls will make out road trips very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: j Cis

customer_reviews.title: Great travel alternative to plastic containers
customer_reviews.text: The food carrier is easier to manage that the bulky plastic tub I used to take when boarding my dog. Wish it held a little more food though. I have a large breed who has three cups of dry food a day, can fit approx 6 days of food in there but then you can't roll the top down enough to be properly secure. Haven't used the bowls, but they seem fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie A. Sargeant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dogs with an active lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: My sister has 2 dogs & take them out regularly (beach, hikes, & walks). I saw them using those plastic collapsible bowls that didn't seem to hold much water or food. I decided to purchase these as a gift & they just love how compact & sturdy the bowls are instead of the flimsy bowls they were using before.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for weekend trips with 3 big dogs! Holds enough food for all of them and we just bring metal bowls from home. The bowls that come with the kit are great for hikes and going on walks with the dogs. They are light and packable. If this set wears out I will buy another no questions asked!
customer_reviews.author: Josh C

customer_reviews.title: Large!
customer_reviews.text: Made well, but FYI these things are huge! Definitely made for a larger dog, like 50-60+ lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and great for vehicle or hiking
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to have along when hiking for Shepard. Well made and held water okay at this time. Roll up very small and tight, so easy to stuff in pack etc. The larger one handles taking some extra food along and sealing up.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Not WATER PROOF
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE: The bowls are not water proof, only water “resistant”. They do not hold water for long periods of time. I took these to the beach for a week because they travel well and was disappointed to find a big puddle on the floor in the morning. If you’re just gonna give your dog water and then pour it out, they’re fine. But for what I needed them for, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Thought the food bag would be bigger
customer_reviews.text: They're good sturdy bags, but the food bag doesn't hold as much as I was hoping it would. I'm purchasing a second set because I need more space, but I wish the bag could be purchased separately since I only need one food bowl (I have a non-spill water bowl) and now I'll have three that I really didn't want to purchase in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Leah D.

customer_reviews.title: Great company to work with!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great company to work with! We had problems with leaking with our initial purchase of these dog bowls, and as soon as this was pointed out to the company the bowls were immediately replaced with two new ones. This was done in a very courteous and professional manner and we are extremely happy with our new bowls. They hold water beautifully, and are in every way as they are advertised to be. Many thanks to this great company! It is so good to find a company that stands by its products!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Myczek

customer_reviews.title: Packable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I took these out on a backpacking trip and they inadvertently were rained on; I thought the dog food inside the large bag would be ruined; still dry. Toss in the wash to clean, but I choose to air dry. Must have if camping with a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Food container holds only 20 cups of dry dog food
customer_reviews.text: I just got these to use for an upcoming camping trip with my two dogs. The quality seems good so far, but I haven't yet used them. Overall, I'm pleased with how they are made and the size of the bowls. However, the dog food container holds only 20 cups of dog food--not 30 as advertised in the description. This is disappointing because it means I need a second container for the trip. I don't need two more bowls though. If you have a large dog, this will probably hold enough food for about 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - good quality and size.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality and size of these two bowls. Nice to have one for water and one for food - nice carry bag that they fit into. Would recommend - perfect for my golden retriever. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I used to carry tupperware bowls for my dog in my backpack which took up a ton of room. These go flat, or can be hung off the back of my pack, and hold a lot of food and water. Durable and lightweight and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RayBran

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Bowl is not waterproof. Used for camping and water leaked through to the bottom of the bowl. I can use for food, but was disappointed that I won't be able to use for water as advertised. Bowls are for large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Solid design, good quality materials and they work! No leaks and easy to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: For a Larger Dog!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something for my small Beagle - this was way too huge! However, if I had a larger dog - seems like a nice product for camping or day trips. Good construction.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Cake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable dog bowls for our 80lb labs for upcoming ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect portable dog bowls for our 80lb labs for upcoming camping trips. The bowls I currently use don’t hold quite enough food and these will be the perfect size for 20oz of dog food and as a water bowl as well.
customer_reviews.author: HSL

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Not waterproof. Shouldn't use it as a water bowl.
customer_reviews.text: False description, water leaks, which means this does not have any function as a water bowl. They should replace one of the liners so it's completely water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Mytv

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Holiday trip 1000 from Florida to Ohio. They are very convenient and easy to pack and bring along, but they tip over very easily, so you might need to hold it while your dog feeds.
customer_reviews.author: Born 2 Impress

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor adventures with big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this primarily for hiking and camping with our husky. So far has held up great on various camping and hiking trips! Its plenty large for big dog breeds. Durable material. Folds up and packs easy.. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great For the Road
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for taking on road trips. Light, take up little space. Haven’t used for water yet so don’t know how well they hold water.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: larger than any other i've found
customer_reviews.text: I have a 170lb bull mastiff and a dane. Their heads are normally too big for the water pouches, but these ones are extra large. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls - very convenient
customer_reviews.text: The bowls were great! They were larger than I expected, but still folded up nicely for storage. My husband and I keep one in the car (just in case) and carry the other with us during hikes and backpacking. They seem very well made, nice and sturdy. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T

customer_reviews.title: Convenient,  light weight and easy to use for the on-the-go dog!
customer_reviews.text: These collapsible dishes are perfect for traveling, camping or just being on the go with my dogs ... they fold up to nothing when not in use and don't leak when they are ... I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: dog food containers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the car for a road trip. Very sturdy construction and comes with two bowls for water and food. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea. I love to take my small dog camping with me but taking food for him has always been a pain. This makes it so much better
customer_reviews.author: Rena Corey

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dishes for my service dog. We are always on the go so good dishes that can go with is important. This fits the bill
customer_reviews.author: Mike Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We keep these in our Jeep. They take up so little space and can be stuffed out of the way.. Our dog uses them with ease. Quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Searcher67

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: I truly like these bowls in so many ways. However, despite the large size, the tapered top makes it hard for two dogs to use at the same time. Very well built and materials that seem to be high end.
customer_reviews.author: Last Days Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog bowls
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver. I usually bring a ziploc and a bowl when I go to the dog park. However these bowls lay flat are holds the water and food really great. They are tough materials so it’s really good.
customer_reviews.author: April T.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy &Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and folds flat Only wish I could seal food in same bag as it does not close on top
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Really solid set of dog bowls. I questioned how water-tight the water bowl was, but there was no seepage after 24 hours with water in it. Really great for traveling or camping
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It’s large enough for a medium size dog. The mesh is a bit Flimsy otherwise Dog were able to drink on hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Massimo

customer_reviews.title: Bowls are water resistance but not water tight
customer_reviews.text: Water does leak through the liner of the bowl over time good for short time usage but I would not leave it full of water for over an hour as it will leak to onto the surface that it is resting on
customer_reviews.author: Steven LaBreck

customer_reviews.title: Every dog owner needs these!
customer_reviews.text: We love these and bring them with us whenever our dogs are with us. They are great quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenJ

customer_reviews.title: My daughter really approves
customer_reviews.text: Daughter had requested for traveling with her dog. Stores food, keeps fresh and has a feeding bowl. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER T.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice guys! We have high standards and these doggy bowls are super durable!!! Lightweight and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after my dog chewed some very expensive ones that we had for a long time. These were very comparable for a fraction of the cost. They are hold a lot but are easily collapsible for storage. Also they hold water great! Had water in one all day and it didn’t leak once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item for take with you for UTVing and ATVing  with your pet.
customer_reviews.text: Great item for my pet for when I take her UTVing or ATVing with me. What I like about this product is that it is portable, compact and light. Great product to have.
customer_reviews.author: Michal Hoellein

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for water
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend using these for travel. Bought for my lab and the openings were not wide enough for him to get food and the water leaked through the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: The engineer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: We use these for camping and keep one on the car for long rides. Fits anywhere and doesn't leak. Way more affordable than many other brands I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: big mac

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to bring back and forth on our camping trip. Dog food holder was a little difficult to keep closed so I just started tying the Velcro in a knot but other than that I love this set!
customer_reviews.author: Salena Brayshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great portable dog bowl
customer_reviews.text: We take our dog on hikes and this is a great bowl. Works as you'd expect:)
customer_reviews.author: Fisxgrl

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and easy to take with you
customer_reviews.text: I use them for the dogs every time I got out with them. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The elastics broke the first time we used it. Other than, we absolutely love this! We go camping and hiking multiple times a year! It is sturdy and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Nimsy Molina

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant not meant for long term water need
customer_reviews.text: Definitely water resistant not water proof. Bought this thinking it was waterproof and it was not. The bowl leaks, however it is relatively good quality in general. Large bowls, hold water for short periods before leaking through. Best for a quick drink situation and that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Neitzke

customer_reviews.title: Great for a large fogs.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to feed and water our Saint Bernard on the go. I wanted something a little bigger to fit enough food and water for our 150 pound dog. These are great. They hold a whole big water bottle full of water, don’t leak and are easy to clean. Penny eats and drunks out if they easily. They are great fir camping, going to the park and hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Cheikh

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality - a little deeper than I anticipated and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality - a little deeper than I anticipated and my dog's big nose has trouble fitting down into the lower parts of the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It’s very reliable and good quality material
customer_reviews.text: It’s very reliable and good quality material. It it foldable so it makes it easy to store and put away. Also it’s shaped in a pouch form which makes it hard to spill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Backcountry
customer_reviews.text: This makes traveling in the backcountry with my dog a lot easier. She is able to carry her food in a bag on her pack with a water bowl and food bowl. I dont have to use plastic bags anymore for her food. Help the environment a little by using less plastic!
customer_reviews.author: fuzylizard10

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact great value
customer_reviews.text: Got these for when walking my dog but he doesn't like it. He's picky. Suggest getting your pet used to it so they know it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: David Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Half bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought these two months ago. One of the bowls leaks - all the water ends up on the ground. Not thrilled about it. Otherwise lightweight and easy to clean, but 1/2 quality review fail. Edited: seller was very responsive to comments/feedback and I received a replacement within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: TMR

customer_reviews.title: or dogs on the go
customer_reviews.text: we hike with our dogs and use dog back-packs for their water bottles and these bowls are perfect for a big drink on the trail!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Love the foldable and easy to use. Light weight. God I got these!!
customer_reviews.author: bambi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight is very important for me.
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is lightweight enough that I barely feel it at all.
customer_reviews.author: M Penelope L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made with sturdy material but still light. The bowls unfold into free standing bowls that don't collapse even when empty. Ideal for hiking/ backpacking with a dog. Used this product for about two months on a weekly basis. Had Ruffware bowls before and like these better because of the way they unfold.
customer_reviews.author: NILS-HELGE SCHLOTE

customer_reviews.title: Hold a lot of water without leaks for several days.
customer_reviews.text: We used these bowls during our recent move over several states. They hold plenty of water for my 80 lb dogs. Only problem we encountered was teaching one dog to not paw the bowl in order to splash water everywhere...such fun!
customer_reviews.author: oldlady

customer_reviews.title: Easy but a bit messy...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to take with us however when we want to pick it up and leave they are a bit messy and they are hard to fill because they are so flexible. Overall I’d purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Vargas

customer_reviews.title: These bowls look good, brought some food to go for our pup ...
customer_reviews.text: These bowls look good, brought some food to go for our pup and did not tip over, real test will be the water! Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon1

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for a Newfie
customer_reviews.text: We take these when we hike with our 140-pound Newfie. The bowls are light weight and durable, but large enough for him to drink from.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money and regular use, Velcro strap works great as a handle, perfect for camping and overnight trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but will leak through if you leave liquids in it for prolonged period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good travel bowls
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bowls for a training class that I started with my puppy. We are required to bring a bowl for water for our dog. I needed new travel dog bowls anyway. They aren't fancy, but seem durable and get the job done. I like that they are soft and fold up pretty small. All in all, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Crady

customer_reviews.title: These compact dog bowls are awesome!! Perfect for hiking and dry nice and ...
customer_reviews.text: These compact dog bowls are awesome!! Perfect for hiking and dry nice and quickly. The fold nice and thin and pop out well when you're ready to use
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for camping and it worked perfect! And cleaning was easy, I simply put it in the washer and air dried. The bowls collapsed and was easy to pack. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: rara17

customer_reviews.title: The one that caught my attention.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to put on the floorboard of the truck, thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Muaddiv

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool. Dog owners have asked me where I got it!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what we needed when taking our pup camping, stays upright and holds water and food well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Holds the food and seals up great!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and hold enough door for a three day trip for our big dog!!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Packs down nicely and fits into the dogs pack so he can carry his own gear. These bowls have a large capacity for food and water which is nice for any size dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good quality
customer_reviews.text: nice dog bowl! Just so lightweight to put in my backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Crystalbaby

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all!
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t at all what it says. The bowls are not waterproof at all! We used them twice on camping trips and are extremely disappointed with the outcome. Water gets everywhere! Do not buy these unless you want to waste water and make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this set for a short time. Delivery was as described. Have only used the bowls twice so far. They hold water without any leaks. Perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stealth

customer_reviews.title: Only one bowl arrived
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, only one bowl arrived (the green one and despite my contacting the seller I have not yet received a response. I would love to have the second bowl since I paid for it. Otherwise, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Petra J Redfield

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and Packable
customer_reviews.text: It is made of great waterproof material, but it is way too large for our 15 lb dog. Wish there were smaller sizes. Very packable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Eiselt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got bowls in two days great packing perfect size for my labrador Oliver. Used one this weekend for baseball game he drank his water, then right back in the truck for next time we camp a lot so there going to be perfect
customer_reviews.author: D Briggs

customer_reviews.title: They leak
customer_reviews.text: First time I used one as a water dish, it leaked. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Upnorth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling and sticking in a purse or backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and price, good size for traveling with my Corgi.
customer_reviews.author: Mdrealtor

customer_reviews.title: Great product. No leakage.
customer_reviews.text: We keep it in the car for our jaunts to the park.
customer_reviews.author: Weaver of Words

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made! The strap fell off as soon as I pulled it out of the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry, dogs got used to them very quickly. I highly recommend these for those long hikes with your best friends.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Craig

customer_reviews.title: Leaks if water kept inside too long
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 4 stars overall only because if you leave water in it more than about an hour, it starts leaking a bit. Otherwise, super great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bloxy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy- genuinely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless ! Water goes through the cloth.. soaking whatever it's on and losing water needed for dog. The food carrier bag never came and it's been many months just the two cloth bowls... save ur money🙏
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Best priced items I've bought in a while
customer_reviews.text: Best priced items I've bought in a while. Good quality, big in size. Makes traveling with my dog a lot more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: F. Mercado

product_meta.title: Awakelion Collapsible Dog Bowl, Portable Travel Dog Bowl Kit for Food and Water -Perfect for Medium & Large Dog
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR DOG TRAVEL: ★not for long term water storage★Collapsible, clean easily and dries fast.Ideal bowls for providing an easy way to give your dog food and water while on the go.Different colors are designed to be easy to distinguish.
LARGE CAPACITY: Size 7 inch (w) x 7 inch (l) x 5 inch deep, having capacity 2000 ML water/ 1KG food, big enough for medium / large Dog.Perfect for all dogs.
ECO-FRIENDLY & NON TOXIC: made of food safe materials to ensure your pet's safety.grease-resistant fabric in order to keep your dog's food fresh in the great outdoors.

WATERPROOF: It is waterproof within about 2 hours ,made of 900d oxford cloth, Waterproof fabric interior holds water very well and ensures no leaks. Great for pet feeding and watering during a travel.Lightweight and easy to store in your pocket or backpack.Easy to clean and dry fast.
FUNCTIONAL ELASTIC STRAPS : Never loose your travel bowls with the handy elastic straps to fold it up or attach the bowls anywhere you need! we stand behind the quality of our products.
